title: #ChangeTheCover
author: VD
content_html:
Consider it changed, courtesy of Captain Privilege. Wait, what, that’s not what they meant by “change the cover”? Really? Ah well, who can keep up with all the various SJW demands these days.

Why so serious, Social Justice Warriors?
